DOC.brief_summary: Study is to show that QVA149 is superior to the standard of care, fluticasone/salmeterol, in patients with moderate to severe airflow limitation.
DOC.brief_title: A 12 Week Study of QVA149 Compared to Fluticasone/Salmeterol (Advair) for Treatment of COPD
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate, Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Age >= 40 years, patients with airflow limitation indicated by postbronchdilation FEV1 >=30% and <80% of predicted normal, current or exsmokers with a 10 pack year smoking history, patients with a mMRC grade 2 or greater prolonged QTCF >450 ms, paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, Type I or uncontrolled Type II diabetes, history of asthma, COPD diagnosis before age 40, receiving treatments not allowed in the study, other concomitant pulmonary diseases. Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
